doc.previous: In Tibet the K lacakra astrological system is one of the main building blocks in the composition of Tibetan astrological calendars 5 The astrology in the K lacakra is not like the Western system in that it employs complicated astronomical calculations to determine for example the exact location of the planets
doc.after: According to the K lacakra Tantra Suchandra Tibetan Dawa Sangpo dharmaraja of Shambhala requested that Gautama Buddha teach him how to practice the dharma without renouncing worldly responsibilities
